text: Na shen zhi tian jing de ren shuo:“Zhuan shunjian, wo jiu ba ta na lai gei ni.” Dang ta kanjian nage baozuo anzhi zai ta mianqian de shihou, ta shuo:“Zhe shi wo de zhu de enhui zhi yi, ta yu yi ci shiyan wo, kan wo shi ganxie zhe, haishi gufu zhe. Ganxie zhe, zhi wei ziji de liyi er ganxie; gufu zhe (xuzhi) wo de zhu que shi wu qiu de, que shi zungui de.”
